name: Administration
text:
§144-1  [OLD] REPEALED.  L 1983, c 214, pt of §2.
 
     §144-1  Administration.  This chapter shall be administered by the department of agriculture, hereinafter referred to as the "department".  [L 1959, c 275, pt of §1; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §22; am L 1961, c 132, §2; Supp, §24-2; HRS §144-2; ree L 1979, c 186, pt of §1; ren L 1983, c 214, pt of §2]
